BriefDescription: Clock cycles executed by the processor core on which the hart is running.  This event counts the same clock cycles as the `cycle` counter, and is subject to the same variations in rate and frequency.
PublicDescription: Clock cycles executed by the processor core on which the hart is running.  This event counts the same clock cycles as the `cycle` counter, and is subject to the same variations in rate and frequency.

BriefDescription: Clock cycles corresponding to the frequency of the hart's interface between its private caches and the rest of the system.  The rate and frequency of this clock may vary.
PublicDescription: Clock cycles corresponding to the frequency of the hart's interface between its private caches and the rest of the system.  The rate and frequency of this clock may vary.

BriefDescription: Reference clock cycles.  This event counts at a fixed frequency.
PublicDescription: Reference clock cycles.  This event counts at a fixed frequency.

BriefDescription: Counts pipeline flushes due to all reasons
PublicDescription: Counts pipeline flushes due to all reasons - such as branch misprediction, memory disambiguation, serializing instructions

BriefDescription: Cycles to recover from pipeline flushes.  Counts cycles the frontend is unable to deliver uops to the backend in the shadow of a pipeline clear.
PublicDescription: Cycles to recover from pipeline flushes.  Counts cycles the frontend is unable to deliver uops to the backend in the shadow of a pipeline clear.

BriefDescription: Instructions retired and/or traps delivered that are recorded by Control Transfer Records (CTR)
PublicDescription: Instructions retired and/or traps delivered that are recorded by Control Transfer Records (CTR)

BriefDescription: Cycles retirement is stalled due to trace backpressure
PublicDescription: Cycles retirement is stalled due to trace backpressure
